Hero.title: Hey, nice to meet you!
Hero.subTitle: I'm Dylan
Hero.content: A digital creative with a passion for digital products that involve design, branding and code — loves to work in a cross-functional team towards a shared vision.

contactTeaser.title: Interested
contactTeaser.content: I'm happy to talk about a possible project, working together, looking for new opportunities or just to catch up. If you'd like to get in touch, just shoot me an message!
